## geom_signif

```{r}
worldbankdata |>
  filter(Year == 2021) |>
ggplot(aes(y = Cooking, x=Income)) + geom_boxplot() + ggsignif::geom_signif()
```

## geom_smooth{#smooth}

```{r}
ggplot(worldbankdata, aes(y = Cooking, x=Electricity)) + 
  geom_smooth() + theme(aspect.ratio=1)

```

```{r}
ggplot(worldbankdata, aes(y = Cooking, x=Electricity)) + 
  geom_smooth(method=lm) + 
  theme(aspect.ratio=1)

```

```{r}
ggplot(worldbankdata, aes(y = Cooking, x=Electricity)) + 
  geom_smooth(method = lm, formula = y ~ splines::bs(x, 4)) + theme(aspect.ratio=1)

```
